name: Golbat

evolution.description: Golbat can evolve into Crobat at level 14 and above when its loyalty is +2 or higher. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 5 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Bat Pokémon. It attacks in a stealthy manner, without warning. Its sharp fangs are used to bite and to suck blood.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to flinching.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: This Pokémon bypasses Light Screen, Reflect, Substitute, Mist, Safeguard, and Aurora Veil.
